name: Acey by Jim Gerrie
description:
I have another entry for the 10Liner contest.  This one for the PUR-120 category.  ACEY is a single-player card game for the TRS-80 MC-10.  A video can be viewed here:

The source code can be viewed here (highest number is latest):

https://github.com/jggames/trs80mc10/tree/master/quicktype/Casino/Card%20Games/Acey

ACEY can be played online at the following link by selecting it from the “Cassette” menu and then typing RUN and hitting :

http://faculty.cbu.ca/jgerrie/MC10/

The VMC10, with ACEY in the Cassette/JimG/4K/ dir can be downloaded here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IZ7z84dlKLHu8IBOzNpFKbX4N3C03r8I/view?usp=sharing

Just type CLOAD and hit and then select ACEY.C10 from the Cassette/JimG/4K/ dir.  Then type RUN and hit

Instructions as REM statements at the end of the program can be viewed by typing LIST and hitting before running the program.

Pic attached.  Thanks again for a great contest,

Jim
